title: Machine Learning for Climate Data Analysis
description: This project involves developing machine learning models to analyze climate data patterns and predict future climate trends. Students will work with large datasets and implement various ML algorithms.
requirements: Strong background in Python programming, knowledge of machine learning fundamentals, and experience with data analysis libraries (pandas, numpy, scikit-learn).

title: Blockchain-based Supply Chain Management
description: Design and implement a blockchain-based system for supply chain transparency and traceability. The project will focus on smart contracts and decentralized applications.
requirements: Knowledge of blockchain technology, smart contracts (Solidity), and web development (JavaScript, React).

title: IoT-based Smart Home Security System
description: Develop an Internet of Things (IoT) based smart home security system with real-time monitoring, alert systems, and mobile app integration.
requirements: Experience with IoT devices, embedded systems programming, mobile app development, and networking protocols.

title: AI-powered Medical Diagnosis Assistant
description: Create an AI system that can assist medical professionals in diagnosing diseases from medical images and patient data.
requirements: Strong background in artificial intelligence, computer vision, medical informatics, and deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow/PyTorch).

title: Quantum Computing Algorithm Implementation
description: Research and implement quantum computing algorithms for specific computational problems, comparing their performance with classical algorithms.
requirements: Strong mathematical background, knowledge of quantum mechanics, and experience with quantum programming languages (Qiskit, Cirq).
